name: Business clicker
description:
The aim of the game is to get one resource, as all clickers, and in this case the resource is obviusly, money.

You have some different types of business, you click on them, and will five you money when they are done.
You can improve that types of business to be faster and to generate more money, and you can also make them authomatic by hiring people to manage them.

This is not a clicker where you can only click and click, in this game you need to follow a strategy, there are differents, so it's your choice.

What to expect:

-Easy gameplay

-Relaxing clicker game

-Original soundtrack

-A lot of options

-Very long gameplay.

-If you close the game, it will be auto saved.
